The {{Lang|'''Feiyun Commerce Guild'''|zh=飞云商会|zh_rm=Fēiyún Shānghuì}} is a powerful trading guild based in [[Liyue]]. It is involved in various endeavors, such as trading silk<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Xu}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Ogura Mio}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Ogura Yuu}}</ref> and printing books.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|This Novel Is Amazing!}}</ref>

They have a warehouse located in the [[Lisha]] region, to the left of [[Mt. Tianheng]] on the world map. They also have a shop in [[Sumeru]] selling jewelry and silk, as well as the materials used to create them.

==Trivia==
* The {{Lang|"Feiyun"|zh=飞云|zh_rm=Fēiyún|zh_tl=Flying Clouds}} in Feiyun Commerce Guild actually uses different characters than the {{Lang|"Feiyun"|zh=绯云|zh_rm=Fēiyún|zh_tl=Scarlet Clouds}} in [[Liyue Harbor#Feiyun Slope|Feiyun Slope]]. However, they are pronounced identically in Chinese. This may be intentional and one may be named after another.
